original: intros n P H. assert (H1: forall x : nat, x < n -> exists y, P x y) by auto. pose proof (fmap_bound n P H1) as H2. destruct H2 as [m H2]. pose proof (fmap_reifier_default nat m P Wf_nat.lt_wf_0 H1) as H3. destruct H3 as [f H3]. exists m, f. intros x H4. split. - apply H3. - apply H1, H4.
